languages.text: Повстанцы имели при себе неидентифицированное оружие и снаряжение — вероятна связь артефактов с местными ксеноруинами, упомянутыми техножрецом.

traits.locale_text: Повстанцы имели при себе неидентифицированное оружие и снаряжение — вероятна связь артефактов с местными ксеноруинами, упомянутыми техножрецом.

languages.text: The rebels were in possession of unidentified weaponry and equipment — this may be linked to the artefacts from the local xenoruins mentioned by the Tech-Priest.
languages.original_text: Повстанцы имели при себе неидентифицированное оружие и снаряжение — вероятна связь артефактов с местными ксеноруинами, упомянутыми техножрецом.

traits.locale_text: The rebels were in possession of unidentified weaponry and equipment — this may be linked to the artifacts from the local xeno-ruins mentioned by the tech-priest.
The rebels were in possession of unidentified weaponry and equipment — this may be linked to the artifacts from the local xeno-ruins mentioned by the tech-priest.
The rebels were in possession of unidentified weaponry and equipment — this may be linked to the artifacts from the local xeno-ruins mentioned by the tech-priest.
The rebels were in possession of unidentified weaponry and equipment — this may be linked to the artefacts from the local xenoruins mentioned by the Tech-Priest.

languages.text: 叛军士兵拥有无法辨识的武器与装备。那些装备可能都是异形造物，源于技术神甫提到过的当地异形遗迹。
languages.original_text: The rebels were in possession of unidentified weaponry and equipment — this may be linked to the artefacts from the local xenoruins mentioned by the Tech-Priest.

traits.locale_text: 叛军士兵拥有无法辨识的武器与装备。那些装备可能都是异形造物，源于技术祭司提到过的当地异形遗迹。

languages.text: 反乱軍は未確認の武器や装備を所持していた。これは技術司祭が言っていた、この地の異種族遺跡のアーティファクトに関連している可能性がある。
languages.original_text: The rebels were in possession of unidentified weaponry and equipment — this may be linked to the artefacts from the local xenoruins mentioned by the Tech-Priest.

traits.locale_text: 反乱軍は未確認の武器や装備を所持していた。これは技術司祭が言っていた、この地の異種族遺跡のアーティファクトに関連している可能性がある。

languages.text: Los rebeldes contaban con armamento y equipamiento no identificado, posiblemente vinculado a los artefactos de las xenoruinas locales que mencionó el tecnosacerdote.
languages.original_text: The rebels were in possession of unidentified weaponry and equipment — this may be linked to the artefacts from the local xenoruins mentioned by the Tech-Priest.

traits.locale_text: Los rebeldes contaban con armamento y equipamiento no identificado, posiblemente vinculado a los artefactos de las xenoruinas locales que mencionó el tecnosacerdote.

languages.text: Die Rebellen waren im Besitz nicht identifizierter Waffen und Ausrüstung ... möglicherweise Artefakte aus den örtlichen Xenoruinen, die der Techpriester erwähnt hatte.
languages.original_text: The rebels were in possession of unidentified weaponry and equipment — this may be linked to the artefacts from the local xenoruins mentioned by the Tech-Priest.

traits.locale_text: Die Rebellen waren im Besitz nicht identifizierter Waffen und Ausrüstung ... möglicherweise Artefakte aus den örtlichen Xenoruinen, die der Techpriester erwähnt hatte.

languages.text: Les rebelles possédaient un arsenal et un équipement non identifiés. Ils pourraient être liés aux artefacts des xénoruines locales dont le technoprêtre avait fait mention.
languages.original_text: The rebels were in possession of unidentified weaponry and equipment — this may be linked to the artefacts from the local xenoruins mentioned by the Tech-Priest.

traits.locale_text: Les rebelles possédaient un arsenal et un équipement non identifiés. Ils pourraient être liés aux artefacts des xénoruines locales dont le technoprêtre avait fait mention.

languages.text: İsyancıların elinde, ne olduğu belli olmayan silahlar ve ekipmanlar vardı. Bu durum, Tekno Rahip'in sözünü ettiği bölgedeki zeno kalıntılarında bulunan eserlerle bağlantılı olabilir.
languages.original_text: The rebels were in possession of unidentified weaponry and equipment — this may be linked to the artefacts from the local xenoruins mentioned by the Tech-Priest.

traits.locale_text: İsyancıların elinde, ne olduğu belli olmayan silahlar ve ekipmanlar vardı. Tekno Rahip'in sözünü ettiği bölgedeki zeno kalıntılarında bulunan eserlerle bağlantılı olabilir.
